mapper.insert: insert into mkt_qst_quest_rel (REL_ID, NAIRE_ID, QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_ORDER, QUESTION_WEIGHT, IS_MARK, IS_MUST, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{relId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{naireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{questionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{questionOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{questionWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isMust,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mkt_qst_quest_rel set NAIRE_ID = #{naireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUESTION_ORDER = #{questionOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUESTION_WEIGHT = #{questionWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_MARK = #{isMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_MUST = #{isMust,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REL_ID = #{relId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select REL_ID, NAIRE_ID, QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_ORDER, QUESTION_WEIGHT, IS_MARK, IS_MUST, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_qst_quest_rel where REL_ID = #{relId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select REL_ID, NAIRE_ID, QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_ORDER, QUESTION_WEIGHT, IS_MARK, IS_MUST, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_qst_quest_rel

select REL_ID, NAIRE_ID, QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_ORDER, QUESTION_WEIGHT, IS_MARK, IS_MUST, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_qst_quest_rel where NAIRE_ID = #{questionnaireId}
